(2010) Determination of some essentialand toxic elements in herbs from Bulgaria and Macedonia using atomicspectrometry, Euroasian journal of Analytical Chemistry 5(2), 104-111.SODRZhINA NA MINERALI VO KhERBA IVO INFUZ OD PLANINSKI ChAJ (SIDERI-TIS SCARDICA I SIDERITIS RAESERI) M. Spaseska1, M. Karapandzhova1, B. Kjazimi1, Gj. Stefkov1, T. Stafilov2, K. Bacheva2,S.Kulevanova11Farmatsevtski fakultet, Univerzitet ,,Sv. Kiril i Metodij", Skopje,R. Makedonija2Prirodno-matematichki fakultet, Univerzitet ,,Sv. Kiril iMetodij", Skopje, R. MakedonijaIsusheni nadzemni delovi od razlichni vidovi od Sideritis, kako shtose Sideritis scardica Griseb. i Sideritis raeseri Boiss. & Heldr. (Lamia -ceae), se poznati kako Planiniski, Ironwort, Shepard's tea,Pirinski i Sharplaninski chaj. Dvete rastenija se mnogu popularnivo Makedonija, Bugarija, Grtsija i vo istochnite delovi odMediteranot, kako osvezhuvachi, no isto taka i za lekuvanje nanastinka. Se koristat za podgotvuvanje na chajni napivki i se smetadeka ublazhuvaat kongestiven sinuzit, bolka, virozi vkluchuvajkjinastinka i grip i dr.Vidovi od rodot Sideritis intenzivno se ispituvani vo odnos nazastapenosta na odredeni khemiski komponenti kako shto seflavonoidi, fenilpropanoidi, derivati na tsimetna kiselina,feniletanoidi (1), diterpeni, iridoidi i drugi slichnikomponenti, kako i vo odnos na sostav na eterichno maslo (2).Neodamna, podatotsi za flavonoidi, feniletanoidi i feilpropa-no idni kiselini i nivnite estri se objaveni za aftokhtoni vidoviSideritis od Makedonija (S.scardica and S.raeseri) (3), kako i podatotsiza sostavot na eterichno maslo od istite dva vida Sideritis (4). Voliteratura mozhe da se najdat mnogu podatotsi za razlichnisekundarni metaboliti, no ima samo nekolku navodi zamineralniot sostav na vidovite Sideritis shto poteknuvaat od Srbijai Turtsija (2, 5). Shto se odnesuva do mineralniot sostav na Sideritisvidovite od Makedonija i Albanija nema podatotsi.Rastenijata, zelenchukot, ovoshjeto kako i lekovitite rastenijapretstavuvaat izvori na minerali. Vnesuvanje na minerali prekusekojdnevna iskhrana ili nekoi drugi izvori e mnogu vazhno zagradenje i funktsioniranje na chovekoviot organizam. Mineralitese potrebni za optimalno funktsioniranje na nervniot sistem,imunoloshkiot sistem, i site muskuli vkluchuvajkji go i srtseto.Sozdavanjeto na khormoni, isto taka, bara vnesuvanje na golemakolichina na minerali. Infuzite od lekoviti rastenija pokrajorganskite aktivni sostojki sodrzhat i razlichni minerali. Nekoiod niv se makro i mikronutrienti no isto taka chajnata napivkamozhe da sodrzhi teshki metali i toksichni minerali.Potentsijalnata kontaminatsija na lekoviti rastenija so toksichnielementi mozhe da se dolzhi na industriskoto zagadu vanje nazhivotnata sredina, avtomobil skite izduvni gasovi ili naupotreba na gjubriva i na insektitsidi (6). Svetskata zdravstvenaorganizatsija (SZO) ima propi shano maksi mal no dozvoleni granitsiza zastapenost na tri toksichni elementi smetano na suva masa narastitelen materijal: arsen, kadmium i olovo (1,0; 0,3 i 10 mg/kg,soodvetno) (7).Zemajkji go predvid gore navedenoto, tselta na ovoj trud e da sedobijat podatotsi za sodrzhinata na nekoi makro i mikronutrientivo kherbi od Sideritis scardica i Sideritis raeseri, kako i vo vodeniinfuzi shto se koristat kako osvezhitelni i lekoviti napivki vo216Makedonski farmatsevtski bilten 57 (dodatok), 2011MEDITsINSKI I AROMATIChNI RASTENIJA poster prezentatsiiPETTI KONGRES NA FARMATsIJATA SO MEGjUNARODNO UChESTVOMake donija i Albanija. Pokraj toa, opredelena e sorzhinata nanekoi toksichni elementi vo suvi kherbi i infuzi, so tsel kontrolana kvalitetot na primerotsite od Sideritis od Makedonija i Albanijavo odnos na toksich nite i metalnite minerali.Ispituvani se dvanaeset primerotsi od Sideritis scardica sobranina razlichni loka liteti od Makedonija i devet primerotsi na S. rae-seri sobrani vo Makedonija i vo Albanija. Rastenijata se sobiranivo faza na tsvetanje i se susheni vo senka. Za mineralizatsija narastitelen materijal e koristena postapka so mikrobranovadigestija. Podgotveni se i in fuzi od 2 g isushen rastitelenmaterijal prelien so 200 ml zovriena voda vo vreme od 10 min,filtrirano i upareno do suvo vo portselanski zdeli. Ostatokot etselosno mi ne ra liziran so HNO3. So primena na atomska emisionaspektrometrija so induk tiv no spregnata plazma (ICP-AES, Varianmodel 715-ES, SAD) i Zeeman-ova elektro ter mich ka atomskaapsorptsiona spektrometrija (Varian SpectrAA 640Z), opredeleni sevkupno 20 elementi. Najzastapeni makronu trienti vo dveta vidaSideritis se K i Ca, zastapeni vo kolichini 6756-16213 mg/kg i 6363-10347 mg/kg, za S. scardica i S. raeseri, soodvetno. Opredeleni seniski sodrzhini na P i Fe, kako i ushte poniski na Na. Interesnirezultati se dobieni za sodrzhinata na Al, vo primerotsite od S.rae-seri koi poteknuvaat od Jablanitsa (S12) i Galichitsa (S15), kako i edenprimerok od Albanija (S7-Gramoz) kade shto sodrzhinata na Aliznesuva 657, 648 i 994 mg/kg, sood vetno. Infuzite sodrzhat 49,5-89,1% od vkupniot K i 46-97% od vkupniot P, i pomali kolichestva nadrugi makronutrienti (do 28,2%, do 43,0%, do 20,9% od vkupniot Ca,Mg i Fe, soodvetno, retko povekje).Sodrzhinata na mikronutrienti vo kherbite od dveta vida Sideritis epromenliva za razlichni elementi pri shto najzastapeni se Zn (do48,6 mg/kg), Mn (do 44,4 mg/kg vo S. scardica i do 40,6 mg/ g vo S.raeseri) i B (do 17,3 mg/kg i 20,0 mg/kg vo dvata vida, soodvetno).Opredeleni se pogolemi sodrzhini na Ba i Sr i poniski sodrzhinina Cu, kako i mnogu poniski sodrzhini na Ni, Li, Cr i Co. Infuziitesodrzhat do 40% od vkupen B, i do 20%, 61,8%, 36%, 30% i 42,3% odvkupnite Ba, Cu, Mn, Sr i Zn, soodvetno.Sodrzhinata na toksichni elementi se dvizhi vo mnogu mali granitsii vo dvata vida iznesuva: za As 0,01-0,59 mg/kg i 0,43-0,98 mg/kg, zaS. scardica i S. raeseri, soodvetno, odnosno, 0,31-3,16 mg/kg i 0,35-1,85 mg/kg za Cd i 0,34-2,79 mg/kg i 0,35-2,49 mg/kg za Pb, za S.scardica i S. raeseri, soodvetno. Za razlika od As i Cd koi mnoguslabo se ekstrakhiraat so zovriena voda, vo najgolem broj sluchaiPb se ekstrakhira povekje od 90% od vkupnata zastapenost vokherbata.LITERATURA1. (2010) Determination of some essentialand toxic elements in herbs from Bulgaria and Macedonia using atomicspectrometry, Euroasian journal of Analytical Chemistry 5(2), 104-111. ANTIDIABETIC AND ANTILIPIDEMIC PROP-ERTIES OF CENTAURIM ERYTHREA L. (GEN-TIANACEAE)Gjoshe Stefkov1, Biljana Miova2, Suzana Dinevska-Kjovkarovska2, Jasmina Petreska2, Marina Stefova2,Gordana Petrusevska3, Svetlana Kulevanova11Faculty of Pharmacy, Vodnjanska 17 Str., 1000 Skopje , Macedonia2Faculty of Natural Sciences, P.O.Box 162 , 1001 Skopje , Macedonia3Faculty of Medicine, Vodnjanska 17 Str., 1000 Skopje , MacedoniaThe aim of this study was to gain insight into the underlying bio-chemical mechanism of action of the antidiabetic and antilipidemicactivities of the dry extract of Centaurium erythrea L., wildly growingin the Republic of Macedonia. The extraction of the areal parts of thedried plant was performed by the maceration in methanol with ultra-sonic agitation (USA extraction), than freeze-dried, which resulted in23,1% dry extract (CE) yield. HPLC-DAD-ESI-MS analyses revealed pres-ence 4 different secoiridoides, 7 flavonoid heterosides i 7 xantonesrepresenting 53%, 25% and 22% of all compounds, respectively.Further, their effect on blood glucose and lipids was tested in normo-and streptozotocin STZ hyperglycemic rats. The short term-12 days-treatment of the STZ-diabetic rats with CE-extracts resulted with 74%reduction of the produced hyperglycaemia, which is only 6% less thanthe reduction caused by glibeclamide (GLB), as a positive control. Liver gluconeogenic enzyme activities and levels of intermediates inthe carbohydrate metabolism were also measured.The CE-extract had a significant impact on the hepatic carbohydratemetabolism, enhancing the direct synthesis of glycogen and reducingthe activity of glucose-6-phosphatase, which further causes reductionof production of blood glucose level. Glycogen accumulation in thehepatocytes was also confirmed with histomorphological analyses. The assessment of the effects after long-term-42 days CE-treatmentleads to conclusion that the blood glucose regulation is most evidentat the beginning of the experiment, decreasing up to the end of theexperiment. It is important to stress that the HbA1c in CE-treatedgroup of animals was even lower than in the GLB-treated groups. The obtained results indicates that long-term treatment with CEextract in SZT diabetic rats has a positive influence and regulate theelevated level of glucose in the blood, which is slightly better than theeffect of glibenclamide.Since we made identification of three groups of compounds in the CE-extract, it is most obviously that all of them (bitter iridoides andxantones, which cause pancreatic and stomach gland stimulation, andflavonoides) probably have influence on the expressedantihyperglycaemic effect. The antilipidemic assessment of the CE-extract revealed no significantchanges on the lipid status (total cholesterol, triglycerides, HDL andLDL level in the blood) of the treated normal and STZ hyperglycemicrats.
